title: [MIRACLE] OH MY GIRL討論區 (26) Closer逆襲！

replies.msg:
Oh My Girl（韓語：오마이걸）為WM Entertainment在2015年推出的八人女子團體。隊長：Hyo Jung 成員包括： JinE、Mimi、YooA、SeungHee、JiHo、Binnie及Arin。「OMG」為經紀公司首度公布的宣傳話題。2015年3月30日，WM Entertainment正式公布新女團的團名為「Oh My Girl」。

2015年 :
3月26日，WM Entertainment透過SNS公開新女團成員人數、姓名、長相等等資訊，預告即將加入今年度的新女團大戰。隨後每天都有新預告的推出，直到3月30日正式公布了新女團的團名。

4月20日，官方公開Oh My Girl的出道單曲《CUPID》MV和第一張迷你專輯《OH MY GIRL》全輯音源，同天舉行Showcase宣告正式出道。

10月7日，官方公開第二張迷你專輯主打歌《CLOSER》MV。《CLOSER》由為少女時代歌曲《Lion Heart》作曲的製作人Shaun Alexander，以及為EXO《Growl》作詞的徐智音(音譯)共同打造而成，富有夢幻色彩的歌曲氛圍以及表現純真少女心的感性歌詞令人印象深刻，其編舞走位加入了12星座的意象，引起了話題。

2016年 :
3月21日，官方公開先行曲《一步兩步》音源，此曲收錄於第三張迷你專輯內。

3月28日，官方公開《PINK OCEAN》全輯音源和主打歌《LIAR LIAR》MV，並舉行回歸Showcase，公布粉絲名為Miracle。

5月19日，官方宣布Oh my girl 將於26日發表改版迷你專輯《Windy day 》，專輯除了收錄《PINK OCEAN 》音源外，更收錄了兩首新曲《Windy day》、《Stupid in love》，以及先前已經公開音源的《LIAR LIAR》中文版，總共以八首歌曲發行。


2017年
4月1日，官方 YouTube 公開收錄曲《Perfect Day》的(OH MY BOY特別版)預告。2日公開主打歌《Coloring Book》的MV預告2，3日官方公開《Coloring Book》全輯音源和主打歌《Coloring Book》MV，並於4日舉行回歸Showcase。

10月30日，WM娛樂於官網及新聞媒體發佈聲明，成員JinE因健康問題將解除合約退出團體，團體以7人體制繼續活動。

2018年
1月6日，官方 YouTube 公開主打曲《Secret Garden》的Spoiler Teaser預告。7日公開主打歌《Secret Garden》的DANCE預告，8日官方主打曲公開《Secret Garden》MV預告。 1月9日韓國時間下午6點公開《秘密庭園》全輯音源和主打歌《Secret Garden》MV，同日日舉行回歸Showcase。

1月10日韓國時間凌晨3時，主打歌《Secret Garden》佔據6個音源實時榜，Melon二位、Soribada二位、Mnet十位、Naver Music二位、Genie二位和Bugs一位，成為出道以來成績最好的一次。

1月23日，於The Show獲得出道以來首次音樂節目一位。1月24日在Show Champion中獲得一位。

3月22日，官方公開第一張Teaser照 오마이걸반하나 後，公布將於4月2日回歸並以特別UNIT《OH MY GIRL BANHANA》為團名發行POP-UP 專輯(POP-UP 專輯是指OH MY GIRL的特別UNIT專輯，不只是部分成員而是全體參與的專輯)。

3月27日公開專輯主打歌《바나나 알러지 원숭이》歌詞並由將孝定.Binnie.Arin三人演唱,而《하더라》則由其餘成員(Mimi.YooA.勝熙.祉呼)演唱,收錄曲《반한게아냐》則為勝熙solo曲。

4月2日韓國時間下午6點公開POP-UP 專輯全輯音源和主打歌MV。

日本出道
OH MY GIRL BANHANA將發行《對香蕉過敏的猴子》的日文版專輯,並預定在8/29以『バナナが食べれないサル』為主打曲在日本出道。

9月10日推出第六張迷你專輯《Remember Me》，主打曲為《불꽃놀이》。9月18日，在 THE SHOW中獲得一位。

2019年
於4月20日，一期粉絲見面會上結尾公布將於5月8日以出道以來首張正規專輯回歸。5月14日，在 THE SHOW中獲得一位。5月15日，在 SHOW champion 獲得第二個一位。5月16日，在M COUNTDOWN獲得第三個一位，這也是OH MY GIRL出道以來在M COUNTDOWN中首次的一位。8月18日在人氣歌謠拿下第一座三大無線台一位。

問候語
「찾았다~ 오마이걸! 안녕하세요. 오마이걸입니다.」
(找到啦～OH MY GIRL！大家好，我們是OH MY GIRL。)

Yesterday i assigned four hours for practicing their songs on my trumpet, cornet, trombone, euphonium, french horn and tuba. I practised with my friends who play glockenspiel, xylophone, marimba, vibraphone, timpani (kettle-drum), chimes and celesta, all of which have definite pitch. Adding these percussion instruments makes the music more rhythmic. Saxophone, clarinet and bass clarinet are single reed instruments. Cor anglais (english horn), oboe, bassoon and contrabassoon are double reed instruments. Flute is a reedless instrument. Cor anglais, saxophone and clarinet are transposing instruments.

新歌係咪之前代言嘅廣告歌

I saw them live at Yokohama Arena which was marvellous. They've been strutting their stuff since they were children so don't sell them short. At the end of the last encore they bowed onstage soaking up the applause. The received thunderous applause and a standing ovation. The group and the dancers and acrobats who were invited to perform gave a superb performance. The choreography, the stage design, lighting design and the light sticks were magnificent and exceeded expectations. Yesterday I assigned six hours for practising their songs on my harp, violin, viola, cello and double bass. I practised with my friends who played glockenspiel, marimba, xylophone, vibraphone, chimes, celesta and timpani (kettle-drum), all of which have definite pitch. Adding these instruments makes the music more rhythmic. Saxophone, cor anglais and clarinet are transposing instruments. Saxophone, clarinet and bass clarinet are single reed instrument while oboe, cor anglais, bassoon and contrabassoon are double reed instruments. Flute is a reedless instrument. My friend Joe isn't very well-to-do while his girlfriend is very well-off. He gave a party at his place last week where cheap wines were served. The sofas in his apartment are made of cheap material. His television is cheap and nasty. Recently he bought some clothes on the cheap from a shop that's facing possible liquidation. He bought a pair of cheap trainers that fell apart after a couple months so I bought him a good quality pair. He's too mean to buy new sneakers. He's very cheap with the air conditioner too-it's only on for an hour each day then he turns on the fans and opens the windows instead but the air conditioner was dirt cheap. He holidayed in Macau last week but he's so cheap he didn't even buy us postcards. He stayed at a three star hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. He's a piano teacher. He explained to us regarding a piece by Haydn "This passage should be played beautifully rather than rhythmically. Otherwise it's a bit cheap." I saw a lot of pencil marks on the score such as: silence, no pause here, cantabile, just separate, clean pedal, more melodic voicing, remain soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time.... Regarding teaching he said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay monthly or for four lessons at a time. For this month you can pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis. From next month onwards you pay monthly. Students of all standards are welcome. I'm also a piano accompanist who accompany instrumentalists, singers and other performers for live performances, exams and auditions. He asked me to get him some Muzio Clementi scores for him as I can get them on the cheap from a friend of mine. We watched a boxing fight where Paul hit Chris with a cheap shot after he lost to Chris. We watched a comedy show as well which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for his vulgar manner and wearing a vulgar suit. His grandfather was a cheap gangster and liar. His jokes and jibes were cheap and vulgar.
